title: Badger
body:
<<if visited ("Badger") is false>>
Norra: Um. . . hello?
Badger: *snurfle snuff sniff*
Norra: Excuse me. . . 
Badger: Hmmm. . .?
 -> Who are you? 
    Badger: I'm a badger.
 -> Where am I?
    Badger: You're in the garden on the estate of the High Faery.
 -> What is going on? 
    Badger: The world is falling apart. Haven't you noticed?
 -> Have you seen a peachick around here by any chance? <<if $searching_for_chicks is true and $number_of_chicks < 3>>
    Badger: A peachick? Is that like a chickpea? 
[[Okay, thanks for the helpful information.|Badger.Exit]]
[[Could you be a little more clear?|Badger.Intro]]
<<else>>
Badger: You're back again. . . 
[[Badger.Intro]]
<<endif>>

title: Badger.Intro
body:
Badger: You're not from around here, are you?
Norra: Not exactly. . .
Badger: It happens from time to time. 
Badger: Too bad for you.
Norra: What?
Badger: Well, it's not the best time to be visiting.
Badger: It's not normally like this, you know. 
[[What is it like normally?|Badger.Explain]]
[[I think it looks nice.|Badger.PreExplain]]

title: Badger.Explain
body:
Badger: Normally it is much more pleasant in the gardens.
Badger: The Faeries used to throw parties and all the animals would join in.
Badger: But the Faeries haven't been seen in ages.
Badger: They've locked themselves away in the castle. . . 
Badger: And ever since the world has grown dark and terrible.
[[Is there anything I can do?|Badger.Help]]
[[Dark and terrible?|Badger.Detail]]

title: Badger.PreExplain
body:
Badger: You think this is nice? 
Badger: What must it be like where you're from. . . 
[[Badger.Explain]]

title: Badger.Detail
body:
Badger: Haven't you noticed?
Badger: The earth shakes and trembles
Badger: creating treacherous cliffs and chasms. . .
Badger: Sharp thorny vines are growing like weeds
Badger: making the pathways impassable.
Badger: Most of my friends have been scared away!
[[Badger.Help]]

title: Badger.Help
body:
Badger: I have been trying to get into the castle.
Badger: It takes a very powerful magic to cause this kind of destruction. . . 
Badger: The Faeries are up to something in there. 
Badger: If you can get into the castle, 
Badger: try and find out what those troublesome Faeries are up to
Badger: and why they are doing this to our home!
[[I'll see what I can do!|Badger.Thanks]]
[[I don't think I should get involved.|Badger.Scold]]

title: Badger.Thanks
body:
Badger: Thank you very much for your kindness. 
Badger: The animals will be eternally grateful.
[[Badger.Exit]]

title: Badger.Scold
body:
Badger: Around here, when someone needs your help. . . 
Badger: you always offer it. 
Badger: It's only the polite thing to do. 
Badger: Plus, you never know what favor you might get in return.
Norra: Okay, I'll see if I can get into the castle.
[[Badger.Thanks]]
